_Original comment by_ **Sylvain Th√©nault (BitBucket: [sthenault](http://bitbucket.org/sthenault), GitHub: @sthenault?)**:

---

anyone to confirm the pb occurs with numppy 1.8 but not previous version ? (I've only 1.7.1 there)

_Original comment by_ **BitBucket: [idella5](http://bitbucket.org/idella5)**:

---

Yes; confirm;

numpy; Installed versions:  1.8.0
